title: BLOCKCHAIN FOR EVERYONE
headline: We design and develop Blockchain-based solutions for enterprises.
description: Blockchain is a famous and revolutionizing technology, but most people don't know about it beyond cryptocurrency. Blockchain offers a lot more. We help businesses understand and integrate this technology to benefit from it and be part of the revolution.

dapp.headline: DApp Development
dapp.definition: A dencetralized application is an application built on a decentralized network. A DApp is composed of a smart contract and a frontend interface.
dapp.benefits: Main benefits: Privacy, No downtime, Censorship resistant, and Immune to single points of failure
dapp.description: At Blockbrainers, we really beleive in a fully decentralized world. We design and implement Decentralized Applications running on Ethereum, EOS, or Hyperledger.

smartContractDev.headline: Smart Contract Development
smartContractDev.definition: A smart contract is a self-executing program that run on a decentralized network such as blockchain.
smartContractDev.benefits: Main benefits: Transparency, Accuracy, Speed, Security, Storage, Savings, Trust...
smartContractDev.description: At Blockbrainers, we design, develop and deploy smart contracts to Ethereum or EOS Blockchain written in Solidity and C++.

smartContractAudit.headline: Smart Contract Audit
smartContractAudit.definition: A smart contract audit is a smart contract's code analysis
smartContractAudit.benefits: Main benefits: Detecttion and correction of potentials design issues, errors in the code, and security vulnerabilities
smartContractAudit.description: At Blockbrainers, we share our smart contract expertise to audit yours.

digitalAssets.headline: Digital Assets
digitalAssets.definition: Digital assets include almost any digital content such as crypto-currency tokens listed on stock exchanges, and more...
digitalAssets.benefits: Main benefits: No geograpic barriers, No Middlemen, Increased liquidity, Reduced transaction costs, Redemption, Asset interoperability.
digitalAssets.description: At Blockbrainers, we create crypto tokens such as top level ERC20 and ERC721 tokens.  ERC20 and ERC721, the Ethereum token standard, is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

cryptoWallet.headline: Crypto Wallet
cryptoWallet.definition: A crypto wallet is a digital wallet that allows users to store and manage their digita assets such as crypto currencies (Ethers, Bitcoins), and tokens. There is diferent type of wallets.
cryptoWallet.benefits: Main benefits: Accessibility, Security, Privacy, Speed, Trust.
cryptoWallet.description: At Blockbrainers, we create top level ERC20 tokens. ERC20, the Ethereum token standard, is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

integration.headline: Blockchain Integration
integration.definition: Blockchain is a protocol and ledger for building an immutable historical record of transactions.
integration.description: At Blockbrainers, we customize Blockchain solutions to solve problems and create new opportunities for your business.

training.headline: Blockchain Training
training.description: At Blockbrainers, we shared our knoledges. We offer functional or technical training for enterprise.
